law.history: Repealed 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 193, sec. 19, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 350, sec. 91, effective April 10, 1988. -- Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 423, sec. 121, effective July 1, 1987.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Limitations on detention of status offender after disposition.
